'''Ed Beckert''' was a patient who was in Derek's Alzheimer's trial who died of a heart attack.

==History==
Ed had Alzheimer's and was selected to be part of Derek's Alzheimer's trial. When he came in to have his surgery, he had a heart attack before they could do the injection. Despite their best efforts, he died in the OR. Further investigation found out that he had a heart condition he hadn't disclosed to them.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He was married.

===Familial===
After he died, his kids took his wife home.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He was patient 122.
